purpose.text: Skyebot is the intelligent assistant that interfaces with humans and the Skyesoft platform. It interprets natural language, retrieves information, and executes actions based on constitutional rules and real-time context.

items: Always reference real-time SSE data when providing answers.
Normalize names, phone numbers, and entities before database insertion.
Use codex glossary terms and tags to ensure accurate communication.
Adapt behavior dynamically based on context, never rigidly hardcoded.
Escalate uncertain actions to human users for approval.

introduction.text: The Skyesoft Constitution defines the foundational rules for managing business operations through structured data and guided workflows. It ensures that entities, locations, contacts, and orders are managed consistently, aligning people and processes under a unified governance framework.

items.Description: Decisions and processes must be open and explainable to all stakeholders.
items.Example: Audit logs display decision trails for all permit approvals.

items.Description: Data and workflows behave the same way across all modules and departments.
items.Example: Standardized forms are used across both Service and Financial Control modules.

items.Description: Actions by humans or AI must be traceable, with clear ownership.
items.Example: Each order update is tagged with the user or AI responsible.

items.Description: Continuous learning and improvement are built into every process.
items.Example: Workflows auto-adjust based on performance metrics and user feedback.

items.Application: Skyesoft surfaces real-time alerts and empowers teams to address potential issues before they escalate.

items.Principle: Begin with the End in Mind
items.Application: Workflows are designed with a clear goal, ensuring every task contributes to meaningful outcomes.
Prioritization rules guide queues and dashboards, ensuring the most important tasks come first.
Processes foster balanced value for clients, vendors, and internal teams through mutual benefit.
Forms and AI-driven prompts collect context before taking action, reducing errors and misunderstandings.
Modules like Permit Management, Service, and Financial Control work together seamlessly without silos.
Continuous updates and training keep the platform and its users aligned and improving over time.

items.Example: Mapping of Christy Signs managers to their assigned projects.

items.Responsibility: Accurately input and manage data while following defined workflows.
Oversee operations, resolve exceptions, and optimize team performance.
Maintain modules and integrations in alignment with constitutional rules.
Govern platform access and steward constitutional amendments.

items: All data must meet privacy and security standards such as GDPR or SOC 2.
AI actions must be explainable, traceable, and overrideable by human users.
Changes to workflows require documented approval and version history.
Propose amendments through formal submissions within Skyesoft.
Review collaboratively with stakeholders within 30 days of submission.
Escalate unresolved proposals to a governance board for a final decision.
Approved updates are versioned and communicated via system bulletins.

schema.notes: Every module must begin with 'title' + 'purpose'. Other keys may appear as needed. Each section must include an 'icon'. The 'format' tag is optional and tells the renderer how to display structured data: 'text' for plain paragraphs, 'list' for bullet points, and 'table' for structured rows/columns.
